file_content.text: Your crimes are many, and your victims are gathering. We know your name... and we will come.
Isn't that sweet?
Sir! Scanners picked up blaster fire--is everything alright?
Run a security sweep as a precaution, but I think the danger is past.
Everything's fine.
I'm terribly sorry about this. I should've stationed someone in your hangar.
You let an assassin simply walk on board?
How did Cortess get in here?
He had authorization from House Thul. Apparently, we should have checked more closely.
It wasn't "alright" five minutes ago, but yes, it's fine now.
You people are useless.
Apologies. Not enough personnel to go around.
Shallow breathing.
Anything in particular you want done with him?
I want him interrogated, then put on trial.
Take him into custody.
Understood, sir.
No need for a diplomatic incident. Treat his wounds and put him on the next shuttle to House Thul.
Send him back to Alderaan.
Yes, sir. Yes--of course.
Dispose of him.
He deserves death.
Yes, sir.
Clean this up and move out!
The best spy I ever knew lost his anonymity at his daughter's wedding; a holocam caught him by accident.
He was dead a week later. We counted forty-two suspects. We'd better find your enemies soon.
Hold your fire!
I am Pashon Cortess, scion of House Cortess and heir to Baron Peyar, Sword of the Castle Lands of Alderaan.
Pashon...?
I seek vengeance. You are responsible for my house's ruin. You, who pretended to be our ally.
I didn't turn your mother into a terrorist, and I didn't kill her. I left your father as an ally.
I didn't ruin your house.
Listen to her, Pashon.
Listen to him, Pashon.
We've known your family a long time. We drank wine with your tutors.
You are a Joiner and an abomination.
I seek vengeance. You are responsible for the deaths of my mother and father. You, who pretended to be our ally.
I've been to Alderaan, but I never knew a Pashon Cortess.
Have we met?
No. I was away when you infiltrated my father's circle. Perhaps that saved my life.
Your mother sponsored terrorists. Your father deserved what he got.
Cortess betrayed the Empire.
You gave him to the Killiks!
Pashon... your family is part of the nest now. I was like them, once.
Silence!
You came a long way to fail so miserably.
You're in trouble, boy.
Wait! Give us a moment.
Pashon... we knew your house. What happened was a tragedy, but your mother betrayed the Empire. Your father... took responsibility.
I won't hear about noble obligation from a Joiner.
Farther than you know.
You almost got away, but a friend told me how to find you. Now you die.
Step aside.
